title: @Riot: Will there be a GD on boards?

replies.body: ye well im guessing Miscellaneous is more off topic tho. So agreed, we need a GD like NA

What I don't get is that if this is "miscellaneous", why are innocent posts/threads made by Gooby, Ringer, etc getting deleted? Their threads that would never have been deleted on GD. Like, I really want to be able to accept Boards as a new home but damn Nazi mod. You're making things hard for me.
You can call a Banana an Apple, but it won't change anything. Changing Misc to GD or vice versa won't do anything either.

We originally had GD, then it changed to Misc I guess.

Get GD back I say.

NA has both GD and Misc. We may hope, my GD Brother.
Let's just hope it isn't like Twisted Treeline where we only get it for a few days each week.
Why not just name it GD then?
